TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit UnionCodeGroup extends System.Security.Policy.CodeGroup
Public NotInheritable Class UnionCodeGroup Inherits CodeGroup
public ref class UnionCodeGroup sealed : System::Security::Policy::CodeGroup

summary.span: Represents a code group whose policy statement is the union of the current code group's policy statement and the policy statement of all its matching child code groups.

span.span: Represents a code group whose policy statement is the union of the current code group's policy statement and the policy statement of all its matching child code groups.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 代码组是构建基块的代码访问安全性策略。Code groups are the building blocks of code access security policy. 每个策略级别包含可以有子代码组 （等），从而形成一个树的根代码组。Each policy level consists of a root code group that can have child code groups (and so on), forming a tree. 每个代码组具有一个确定是否给定的程序集属于它或不是，基于该程序集的证据的成员资格条件。Each code group has a membership condition that determines if a given assembly belongs to it or not, based on the evidence for that assembly. 其成员资格条件匹配给定的程序集的唯一代码组和它们的子代码组应用策略。Only code groups whose membership conditions match a given assembly and their child code groups apply policy. 是最常见的类型的代码组。所有匹配的子代码组的策略语句 (并扩展到它们的子代码组) 组合使用匹配的父代码组的权限集。 is the most common type of code group; the policy statement of all matching child code groups (and by extension their child code groups) are combined with the permission set of the matching parent code group. 因此，如果其成员资格条件匹配，此代码组构成其策略语句的 union 和也与证据匹配的所有子代码组。Thus, if its membership condition matches, this code group forms the union of its policy statement and those of all its child code groups that also match the evidence. 代码组是由 CASPOL 实用程序创建的代码组 (请参阅[Caspol.exe （代码访问安全策略工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/caspol-exe-code-access-security-policy-tool.md))。 code groups are the code groups created by the CASPOL utility (see [Caspol.exe (Code Access Security Policy Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/caspol-exe-code-access-security-policy-tool.md)).

param.name: membershipCondition
param.span: A membership condition that tests evidence to determine whether this code group applies policy.

span.span: A membership condition that tests evidence to determine whether this code group applies policy.

param.name: policy
param.span: The policy statement for the code group in the form of a permission set and attributes to grant code that matches the membership condition.

span.span: The policy statement for the code group in the form of a permission set and attributes to grant code that matches the membership condition.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数创建一个基本代码组，并且应从自定义代码组的构造函数调用。This constructor creates a basic code group and should be called from the constructors of custom code groups. 可以使用添加子代码组方法。You can add child code groups by using the method.

exception.span: The type of the parameter is not valid.

Public Overrides Function Copy () As CodeGroup

summary.span: Makes a deep copy of the current code group.

span.span: Makes a deep copy of the current code group.

returns.span: An equivalent copy of the current code group, including its membership conditions and child code groups.

span.span: An equivalent copy of the current code group, including its membership conditions and child code groups.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使代码组的深层副本，从而还生成的代码组所包含的所有对象的副本。This method makes a deep copy of the code group, so that copies of all objects the code group contains are also made.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property MergeLogic As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ MergeLogic { System::String ^ get(); };

span.span: Gets the merge logic.
Always the string "Union".

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.Policy.PolicyStatement Resolve(class System.Security.Policy.Evidence evidence) cil managed

span.span: The evidence for the assembly.

summary.span: Resolves policy for the code group and its descendants for a set of evidence.

span.span: Resolves policy for the code group and its descendants for a set of evidence.

returns.span: A policy statement consisting of the permissions granted by the code group with optional attributes, or if the code group does not apply (the membership condition does not match the specified evidence).

span.span: A policy statement consisting of the permissions granted by the code group with optional attributes, or if the code group does not apply (the membership condition does not match the specified evidence).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将给定的加载程序集的证据，通过先检查针对指定的证据的成员资格条件评估代码组。Given evidence for an assembly to be loaded, this method evaluates the code group by first checking the membership condition against the specified evidence. 如果没有匹配项，则此方法返回的代码组，其中包括评估的子代码组的策略语句。If there is a match, this method returns a policy statement for the code group, including evaluation of child code groups. 对于联合代码组，还解析其成员条件与证据匹配的所有子代码组，并生成的所有策略语句都形成并集父级联合代码组的策略语句。For union code groups, all child code groups whose membership condition match the evidence are also resolved, and all resulting policy statements form a union with the policy statement of the parent union code group. 每个子代码组类型确定如何应用及其子组，具体取决于如何相应方法的工作原理。Each child code group type determines how its child groups are applied, depending on how their respective methods work. .NET Framework 安全系统使用上的策略级别来确定加载的代码从生成的策略语句和代码授予哪些权限请求的程序集。The .NET Framework security system uses on the policy levels to determine which permissions to grant to loaded code from the resulting policy statements and the code request on the assembly. 如果成员资格条件不匹配指定的证据，此方法返回`null`; 否则为它将权限设置为返回 (P) 设置为等于代码组的策略语句，然后继续。If the membership condition does not match the specified evidence, this method returns `null`; otherwise, it sets the permission set to be returned (P) equal to the code group's policy statement, and then continues. 对于每个子代码组，该方法解析代码组的同一个证据;如果结果不为`null`，它会设置 P 等于 P 和子代码组的策略语句的并集。For each child code group, the method resolves the code group with the same evidence; if the result is not `null`, it sets P equal to the union of P and the child code group's policy statement. 然后，它返回 P，现在是当前代码组的策略声明和所有子组策略声明的联合。It then returns P, which is now the union of the current code group's policy statement and all child group policy statements.

span.span: The parameter is .

exception.span: More than one code group (including the parent code group and any child code groups) is marked .

span.span: More than one code group (including the parent code group and any child code groups) is marked .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.Policy.CodeGroup ResolveMatchingCodeGroups(class System.Security.Policy.Evidence evidence) cil managed

span.span: The evidence for the assembly.
Resolves matching code groups.

returns.span: The complete set of code groups that were matched by the evidence.

span.span: The complete set of code groups that were matched by the evidence.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将给定的加载程序集的证据，通过先检查针对指定的证据的成员资格条件评估代码组。Given evidence for an assembly to be loaded, this method evaluates the code group by first checking the membership condition against the specified evidence. 如果没有匹配项，则此方法返回的根代码组。If there is a match, this method returns a root code group. 返回的代码组可能包含子代码组，这反过来，也可能包含子代码组，因此返回值反映了所提供的证据匹配的代码组的完整集合。The code group that is returned may contain child code groups, which, in turn, may also contain child code groups, so the return value reflects the complete set of code groups that were matched by the evidence provided.

span.span: The parameter is .
